sentences.en: Beyond that, any conclusions must be regarded as speculative.
sentences.cn: 除此之外, 任何结论均只能看作是推理性的.

sentences.en: He had a speculative gleam in his eyes.
sentences.cn: 他眼睛里闪过一丝探寻的神情.

sentences.en: He has written a speculative biography of Christopher Marlowe.
sentences.cn: 他写了一篇关于克里斯托弗·马洛的推测性传记。

sentences.en: He ventured large sums of money on speculative stocks.
sentences.cn: 他将大笔的钱拿去做股票投机.

sentences.en: His mother regarded him with a speculative eye.
sentences.cn: 他的母亲用好奇的目光看着他。

sentences.en: His smooth, speculative face is composed to benevolent expectation.
sentences.cn: 他那张光滑而沉思的脸露出助人为乐的慈祥神色.

sentences.en: It is unclear whether proposals have gone beyond the speculative stage.
sentences.cn: 人们并不清楚,这些想法是否已超越纯理论阶段.

sentences.en: It rejects all dogmatic and speculative assertions in philosophy.
sentences.cn: 它摈弃哲学中一切教条的和纯理论的主张.

sentences.en: Much of her work is speculative, based on psychoanalytic theory rather than empirical data.
sentences.cn: 她的著作中有相当一部分内容是推测性的，建立在精神分析理论之上而缺乏来自实际经验的数据。

sentences.en: She cast a speculative look at Kate.
sentences.cn: 她带着疑问的眼神看了凯特一眼。

sentences.en: The boss has put all his money into that speculative enterprise.
sentences.cn: 这个老板把他的全部财产都投到那个投机事业中.

sentences.en: The papers ran speculative stories about the mysterious disappearance of Eddie Donagan.
sentences.cn: 各家报纸都刊登了有关埃迪·多纳根神秘失踪的猜测性报道。

sentences.en: The political aspects were at once more remote and speculative.
sentences.cn: 政治形势则比较模糊,难以料定.

sentences.en: This claim was too speculative to provide them with standing.
sentences.cn: 这一论断太牵强,不能使他们拥有起诉权.

sentences.en: Thousands of pensioners were persuaded to mortgage their homes to invest in speculative bonds.
sentences.cn: 几千名领取养老金的人被劝说用自己的住房作抵押去投资投机性债券。

words.tran_cn: 投机；推测；思索；投机买卖
投机的；推测的；思索性的

trans.tran_cn: 投机的，思考的，推理的，揣摩的
trans.tran_en: bought or done in the hope of making a profit later
